description: Spoil yourself with homemade fresh cranberry sauce this Christmas. Mary Berry's fresh version takes seconds to make.

default: 1 small, thin-skinned orange, cut into quarters, pips removed

steps: Blend all of the cranberry sauce ingredients in a food processor until smooth.
Either serve cold or gently heat through. Serve with roast turkey or leftover cold cuts.
tips: This sauce can be made up to 1 day in advance and kept, covered, in the fridge, until needed.
title: Raw cranberry sauce
